mapper.select: SELECT c.dno ,d.dname,count(DISTINCT c.employeno) as clockMorningCount,d.count AS deptCount,(SELECT count(DISTINCT c.employeno) as clockAfterCount FROM clockemploye c, depall d WHERE TO_DAYS(c.clocktime) =TO_DAYS(NOW()) AND c.dno=d.dno AND c.type="下午" GROUP BY c.dno ) as clockAfterCount FROM clockemploye c, depall d WHERE TO_DAYS(c.clocktime) =TO_DAYS(NOW()) AND c.dno=d.dno AND c.type="上午" GROUP BY c.dno
